      • getInstance

        public static ZoomSDK getInstance()
        Get shared instance of ZoomSDK
        Returns:
        The ZoomSDK istance

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Context context,
                       java.lang.String appKey,
                       java.lang.String appSecret,
                       ZoomSDKInitializeListener listener)
        Initialize ZoomSDK Zoom SDK will retry to call verifyApp automatically if failed because of network issue.
        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        appKey - Your APP Key from zoom.us
        appSecret - Your APP Secret from zoom.us
        listener - Listener for initialize result

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Context context,
                       java.lang.String appKey,
                       java.lang.String appSecret,
                       boolean autoRetryVerifyApp,
                       ZoomSDKInitializeListener listener)
        Initialize ZoomSDK
        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        appKey - Your APP Key from zoom.us
        appSecret - Your APP Secret from zoom.us
        autoRetryVerifyApp - If it is true, Zoom SDK will retry to call verifyApp automatically if failed because of network issue. Else user needs to call verifyApp manually after initialize failed.
        listener - Listener for initialize result

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Context context,
                       java.lang.String appKey,
                       java.lang.String appSecret,
                       java.lang.String domain,
                       ZoomSDKInitializeListener listener)
        Initialize ZoomSDK Zoom SDK will retry to call verifyApp automatically if failed because of network issue
        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        appKey - Your APP Key from zoom.us
        appSecret - Your APP Secret from zoom.us
        domain - Zoom site domain name. Default value is zoom.us
        listener - Listener for initialize result

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Context context,
                       java.lang.String appKey,
                       java.lang.String appSecret,
                       java.lang.String domain,
                       boolean autoRetryVerifyApp,
                       ZoomSDKInitializeListener listener)
        Initialize ZoomSDK
        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        appKey - Your APP Key from zoom.us
        appSecret - Your APP Secret from zoom.us
        domain - Zoom site domain name. Default value is zoom.us
        autoRetryVerifyApp - If it is true, Zoom SDK will retry to call verifyApp automatically if failed because of network issue. Else user needs to call verifyApp manually after initialize failed.
        listener - Listener for initialize result

      • getVersion

        public java.lang.String getVersion(Context context)

      • isDeviceSupported

        public boolean isDeviceSupported(Context context)

      • verifyApp

        public void verifyApp(java.lang.String appKey,
                      java.lang.String appSecret,
                      boolean autoRetryVerifyApp)
        Verify the application. The application must be verified before it is able to connect to a Zoom meeting. This method will be called automatically on initialize being called.
        Parameters:
        appKey - Your APP Key from zoom.us
        appSecret - Your APP Secret from zoom.us
        autoRetryVerifyApp - If it is true, Zoom SDK will retry to call verifyApp automatically if failed because of network issue. Else user needs to call verifyApp manually after initialize failed.

      • isInitialized

        public boolean isInitialized()
        Check if ZoomSDK has been initialized
        Returns:
        true if it is initialized

      • setDomain

        public void setDomain(java.lang.String domain)
        Set Zoom site domain name
        Parameters:
        domain - The Zoom site domain name to set. Default value is zoom.us.

      • getDomain

        public java.lang.String getDomain()
        Get Zoom site domain name
        Returns:
        current Zoom site to use.

      • setDropBoxAppKeyPair

        public boolean setDropBoxAppKeyPair(Context context,
                                    java.lang.String appKey,
                                    java.lang.String appSecret)
        DropBox App key pair must be set to enable "Share Dropbox". You need also to declare Dropbox AuthActivity in the AndroidManifest.xml as follows, and replace {YourAppKey} with the appKey: You can register your application on DropBox and get your app key pair from: https://www.dropbox.com/developers/apps
        Parameters:
        context -
        appKey -
        appSecret -
        Returns:
        success or not

      • setOneDriveClientId

        public boolean setOneDriveClientId(Context context,
                                   java.lang.String clientId)
        OneDrive client ID must be set to enable "Share OneDrive". You can register your application on Microsoft OneDrive and get your client ID from: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=193157
        Parameters:
        context -
        clientId -
        Returns:

      • setBoxAppKeyPair

        public boolean setBoxAppKeyPair(Context context,
                                java.lang.String appKey,
                                java.lang.String appSecret)
        Box App key pair must be set to enable "Share Box". You need also to download Box Android library v2 and Box Java library from https://developers.box.com. Add this libraries to your project's dependency. Declare Box OAuthActivity in the AndroidManifest.xml as follows: You can register your application on Box and get your app key pair from: https://developers.box.com
        Parameters:
        context -
        appKey -
        appSecret -
        Returns:
        success or not

      • setGoogleDriveClientId

        public boolean setGoogleDriveClientId(Context context,
                                      java.lang.String clientId)
        Google Drive client ID must be set to enable "Share Google Drive". You can register your application on Google API console and get your client ID from: https://code.google.com/apis/console
        Parameters:
        context -
        clientId -
        Returns:

      • getMeetingService

        public MeetingService getMeetingService()
        Get MeetingService instance
        Returns:
        The shared instance of MeetingService. Return null if the SDK has not been initialized successfully.

      • getMeetingSettingsHelper

        public MeetingSettingsHelper getMeetingSettingsHelper()
        Get MeetingSettingsHelper instance
        Returns:
